name: Purchase VAT
query:
SELECT
  purchInv.name as "Purchase Invoice:Link/Purchase Invoice:200",
  purchInv.posting_date as "Posting Date:Date:120",
  purchInv.supplier_name as "Supplier:Link/Supplier:150",
  purchInvItem.item_name as "Item Name:100",
  birCompany.bir_company_name as "BIR Name:100",
  purchInvItem.qty as "Qty:100",
  purchInvItem.base_net_amount as "Net Amount:100",
  purchInv.bill_no as "Supplier Invoice No:100",
  purchInv.bill_date as "Supplier Invoice Date:100",
  case when isnull(itemTaxDetail.tax_type) then purchInv.taxes_and_charges else concat(purchInvItem.item_tax_template," (ITEM-WISE)") end as "Purchase Taxes and Charges:100",
  case when isnull(itemTaxDetail.tax_type) then transTax.rate else itemTaxDetail.tax_rate end as "Tax Rate:100",
  case when isnull(itemTaxDetail.tax_type) then purchInvItem.base_net_amount*ifnull(transTax.rate/100,0) else purchInvItem.base_net_amount*ifnull(itemTaxDetail.tax_rate/100,0) end as "Tax Amount:100"
FROM `tabPurchase Invoice` as purchInv inner join
`tabPurchase Invoice Item` as purchInvItem on purchInv.name = purchInvItem.parent left outer join 
`tabPurchase Taxes and Charges` as transTax on purchInv.taxes_and_charges=transTax.parent left outer join 
`tabItem Tax Template Detail` as itemTaxDetail on purchInvItem.item_tax_template=itemTaxDetail.parent and transTax.account_head=itemTaxDetail.tax_type left outer join 
`tabBIR Company` as birCompany on birCompany.name = purchInvItem.bir_company
WHERE purchInv.docstatus>0 and not purchInv.status in ("Cancelled", "Draft") and isnull(itemTaxDetail.tax_type)=0 and transTax.add_deduct_tax="Add" and purchInv.posting_date >= %(from_date)s and purchInv.posting_date <= %(to_date)s
